pr_title: Wordcount on Dataproc WORKS! (No more NPEs)

timeline.message: Wordcount on Dataproc WORKS! (No more NPEs)

timeline.bodyText: Why are you asking for Maven Local?  is there another step that loads things into it?
timeline.author: lesv

replies.bodyText:
Nice catch! It's to speed up dependency resolution when a user uses maven (most likely) or gradle as well as sbt.
The main reason was to let me debug an issue with a dependency that I built locally.
I thought I'd remove it, but decided not to since it may speed things up while resolving dependencies. I'm fine either way.
replies.author: jaceklaskowski

replies.bodyText: You probably want to remove it, as it will look there anyway.
replies.author: lesv

replies.bodyText:
it will look there anyway.

Nope. It will not (but can) as described in https://www.scala-sbt.org/1.x/docs/Library-Dependencies.html#Resolvers:

sbt can search your local Maven repository if you add it as a repository
replies.author: jaceklaskowski
